condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Effectiveness Conditions (Article IV, para 5.01) | Description :The Recipient has a designated ProjectCoordinator, in accordance with the provisions of Section I.A of Schedule 2 to this Agreement. | Due Date :03-Jan-2014
